contest-event.event-date:
July 2, 2016 D Whiston Festival of Brass Contest
Whiston Festival of Brass Contest 10 Entertainments Contest Whiston Festival of Brass whiston-festival-of-brass-contest
Entertainments Contest
Whiston, South Yorkshire The Festival will incorporate the ‘March’ element again, so we ask the bands, to march the short route. Starting outside of the Methodist Church on the hill and finish some 200 yards alongside the concert stage. The route will be suitably barricaded/fenced on both sides and will be void of spectators to allow this to take place safely.
July 6, 2015, 2:31 p.m. June 18, 2016, 7:14 a.m.
1 Chapeltown Silver Prize Band Andrew Dennis
2 Strata Brass Owen Wedgwood
3 Stannington Band Derek Renshaw
4 Shirland Welfare Band Lynden Cooper
Unknown Result Frickley South Elmsall Band Kyle Blake
Unknown Result Thurlstone Brass Band Jonathan Bates
Unknown Result Maltby Miners Welfare Band Terry Clifford
Withdrawn Loxley Silver Band Lee Dunkley
Withdrawn Dronfield (CMW) Band Simon Kerwin
